Dany Moline Aguirre

A Peru-born Spanish Teacher
Self-loving Full of Life Culturally Enriched
I moved to India in 1994 for the love of my life, whom I met in Moscow. There was so much to adapt to culturally, like the way of dressing was so different to. I used to struggle buying good quality clothes in affordable prices back in the day. Until a few years ago, I discovered Saadaa. It honestly felt like the solution I had been looking for all along those initial years for my wardrobe. The fabrics are soft, durable, and full of beautiful colours. I now own more than 25 Saadaa pieces, have gifted them to my sisters and friends in Italy, and even bought my Christmas outfit from Saadaa two months in advance. It’s such a great option, especially for plus-size women like me.
